description:
- [x] This doc is inaccurate in this way:

The scheduler driver config option was restricted to a known set of in-repo drivers in Ocata:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/349666/

So the examples about creating a custom scheduler driver for Nova are not valid after Newton. We should put a warning in that page or just remove it.

-----------------------------------
Release: 15.0.0 on 2017-06-27 09:59
SHA: cc281cac69483977f3eed49f03f9bfac850cd7f0
Source: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/openstack-manuals/tree/doc/source/ops-customize-compute.rst
URL: https://docs.openstack.org/ops-guide/ops-customize-compute.html
title: Customizing the OpenStack Compute (nova) Scheduler in Operations Guide

comments.content:
- [x] This doc is inaccurate in this way:

The scheduler driver config option was restricted to a known set of in-repo drivers in Ocata:

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/349666/

So the examples about creating a custom scheduler driver for Nova are not valid after Newton. We should put a warning in that page or just remove it.

-----------------------------------
Release: 15.0.0 on 2017-06-27 09:59
SHA: cc281cac69483977f3eed49f03f9bfac850cd7f0
Source: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/openstack-manuals/tree/doc/source/ops-customize-compute.rst
URL: https://docs.openstack.org/ops-guide/ops-customize-compute.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: Assigned to nova also since the guides are going to move out of manuals and into the project repos.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
